meanings.definition: A member of a group of people who are descendants of the biblical patriarch Ched.
meanings.sent1: The chedite was proud of their heritage.
meanings.sent2: Many chedites gathered to celebrate their ancestry.
meanings.sent3: The chedite joked that they could trace their family tree all the way back to Ched.
meanings.sent4: She stood tall and strong like a chedite, embodying the strength of her lineage.
meanings.sent5: The chedite wore traditional clothing to honor their forefathers.

meanings.definition: A type of mineral that is a hydrated sodium calcium carbonate.
meanings.sent1: The chedite mineral had a unique crystalline structure.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a rich vein of chedite in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The jeweler crafted a beautiful necklace using chedite as the centerpiece.
meanings.sent4: The chedite sparkled in the sunlight, resembling a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: Geologists studied the formation process of chedite deposits.
